snippet: Immediately changing passwords after a security breach could feed a new password into a website that has not fixed the flaw, a security consultant said....

headline.print_headline: Security Flaw Stresses Need to Change Passwords
headline.main: Heartbleed Security Flaw Emphasizes the Need to Change Passwords

abstract: Immediately changing passwords after a security breach could feed a new password into a website that has not fixed the flaw, a security consultant said.
